publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1078 Linda Fabiani: Scottish Civic Forum 1 July 2000-That the Parliament notes the success of the Scottish Civic Forum event on Saturday 1 July 2000 in the Chamber and congratulates Scottish Civic Forum; considers the event to have been a fitting celebration of the first anniversary of the Parliament and requests that the Corporate Body investigates the possibility of such events being held more often in the Chamber, perhaps four times a year, to allow parliamentarians more opportunities to hear the views of the people of Scotland. Supported by: Andrew Wilson*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1078 Scottish Civic Forum 1 July 2000 (lodged on 3 July 2000) Alex Neil*, Fergus Ewing*

Supported by: Andrew Wilson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alex Neil, Fergus Ewing, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Ms Sandra White*, Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-1078 Scottish Civic Forum 1 July 2000 (lodged on 3 July 2000) Michael Russell*, Irene McGugan*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-1078 Scottish Civic Forum 1 July 2000 (lodged on 3 July 2000) Shona Robison*
S1M-1078 Scottish Civic Forum 1 July 2000 (lodged on 3 July 2000) Ian Jenkins*
